doc:
Antoinette Perry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antoinette_Perry 0 Mary Antoinette "Tony" Perry (June 27, 1888 – June 28, 1946) was an American actress, director and co-founder of the American Theatre Wing. She is the namesake of the Tony Awards. Mary_Antoinette_"_Tony_"_Perry ( June_27_,_1888 – June_28_,_1946 ) was an_American_actress_,_director_and_co-founder of the_American_Theatre_Wing . She is the_namesake of the_Tony_Awards .
